description:
Glasgow, KY Providing representation in personal injury cases, Flora Templeton Stuart is in Kentucky and Tennessee and serves injured clients throughout the nation. The Law Firm of Flora Templeton Stuart consistently exceeds clients’ expectations in matters, including semi-truck accidents, car accidents, nursing home abuse, other personal injuries.

Past clients of this law firm provide glowing reviews, noting the staff’s communication skills and compassion. Ms. Stuart has obtained multi-million dollar settlements for her injured clients, which includes one in excess of $3 million for a client injured in a trucking accident.

Every case at the Law Firm of Flora Templeton Stuart begins with a free initial consultation, and clients are represented on a contingency basis, meaning the firm only collects fees from the client’s recovery. Ms. Stuart’s team is receptive to clients’ concerns; they answer the phone around the clock, and they make themselves available to meet with people in their homes or at the hospital. Further, they launch their own in-depth investigations into every case to unearth important details and document all damage.
